DataElement.preferredName: Radiation Therapy Complete Continuing Planned Status Yes No Unknown Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text term to signify that a regimen of exposure of a body site(s) to radiation therapy has been completed, is ongoing or is planned.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Radiation Therapy Complete Continuing Planned Status
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Having brought to a conclusion treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation._To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion._Remain in force or carry on without letup; keep or maintain in unaltered condition; exist in time or space without stop or interruption._To devise, contrive, or form in design._A condition or state at a particular time.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: use PHOTOTHERAPY, LASER THERAPY, or ULTRAVIOLET THERAPY for therapeutic radiation with visible, laser, or ultraviolet light, respectively.

Concepts.definition: Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.

Property.preferredDefinition: To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.:Remain in force or carry on without letup; keep or maintain in unaltered condition; exist in time or space without stop or interruption.:To devise, contrive, or form in design.:A condition or state at a particular time.

Concepts.definition: To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.
Remain in force or carry on without letup; keep or maintain in unaltered condition; exist in time or space without stop or interruption.
To devise, contrive, or form in design.
A condition or state at a particular time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or unknown.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 4-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reeves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 3/35/2016 jk removed "indeterminate" value that was added in error. 7/7/2021wz: added ALT VM name for HOPE-CARE project.
